search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Formidable Forms (formidable.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Formidable Forms is: [https://formidableforms.com/pricing/](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/)  .

extracted_content.content:

[See All Features](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#all-features) All pricing is in USD. You can upgrade your plan at any time.  
\* Special introductory pricing, renewals are at full price.

### 100% No-Risk, Money Back Guarantee!

We're excited to have you experience the power of Formidable Forms. Over the next 14 days, if Formidable Forms isn’t the best fit for your project, simply reach out! We’ll happily refund 100% of your money. _No questions asked._

Thanks,  
![Image 2: Steph Wells](https://formidableforms.com/wp-content/themes/fp2015git/images/sig.png)

**Steph Wells**  
Formidable Forms Co-founder and CTO

Common Questions
----------------

[Who should use Formidable Forms?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

Formidable Forms is perfect for freelancers, agencies, business owners, bloggers, designers, developers, photographers, and basically everyone else. If you want to create a custom WordPress form, then you need to use Formidable Forms. Our mission is to empower freelancers and agencies to create advanced, solution-focused forms with confidence.

[Do you offer a trial?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

You can get a good feel for the form maker plugin by installing our [free WordPress forms](https://wordpress.org/plugins/formidable/). Additionally, we offer a full **money-back guarantee for 14 days**. If Formidable Forms doesn't meet your needs, you can [contact us](https://formidableforms.com/new-topic/) for a full refund.

[How long will I receive support and updates?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

After your license expires, renewal is required for continued access to support, plugin updates, and new addons for your plan. Add-ons released for your plan while your support is active are included. Those released after expiry are not available without renewal. If your license has expired, get details on [how to renew](https://formidableforms.com/knowledgebase/manage-licenses-and-sites/#kb-renewing).

Renewal covers a full year of support, plugin updates, and access to any new add-ons we release during that year for your plan.

Access to download form and style templates for free is available for download with current Elite support. If support is expired, access to download these templates will also expire.

[What level of support can I expect?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

Support is our highest priority. We want you to succeed with your endeavors and we are here to back you up. Different levels of support help our team prioritize the order in which tickets are handled. Those with **Elite** support can plan on hearing from our team within 4 business hours. Those with **Priority** support are next in the ticket queue, and can generally expect the first response within 6 business hours. **Standard** support tickets will receive a response within 12 business hours.

Our support covers all built-in features. It is up to you to install the plugin and setup everything you need. If you have questions, we provide you with instructions to help you get the results you want.

If your request requires code beyond the built-in features, we will point you towards a similar code example if available. Writing, customizing, and troubleshooting any type of custom code (HTML, CSS, PHP, Javascript) is up to you or the developer you hire.

[Can I have a development site?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

Yes. You can set up any number of local sites and a staging site with a specific subdomain. The options include staging.yoursite.com, dev.yoursite.com, test.yoursite.com, local.yoursite.com, or beta.yoursite.com for the URL. If you have a WP multi-site install, our support covers the main site if you have support for a single-site.

[Can I upgrade my license later?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

Of course. You can upgrade your license at any time from your [licenses page](https://formidableforms.com/account/licenses/). Learn more about how to upgrade an existing license [how to upgrade an existing license](https://formidableforms.com/knowledgebase/manage-licenses-and-sites/upgrading-your-licenses/).

[Will I get access to future add-ons?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

When you purchase a plan, you get access to everything that is currently listed on the pricing page. As new add-ons are released, you will be able to add them at no charge while your license and support are current. If your support/license expires, renewal is required in order to get access to any new products for your plan.

[What types of payment do you accept?](https://formidableforms.com/pricing/#)

We use PayPal and Stripe to process payments. They accept debit, Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. Your credit card information is not stored on our site.

Stunning customer support (and a great product too). I’ve been a database engineer for nearly 40 years and worked with some great products, but Formidable Forms provides real web based business solutions out of the box and at so little cost.

Caryl Wills C1 Racing Club

Formidable Forms is the most complete plug in service I’ve found for WordPress. There’s nothing I’ve found comes even close to what the tools they offer and their solution and services category they provide.

![Image 3: Offerscode](https://formidableforms.com/wp-content/themes/fp2015git/images/offerscode.jpg) Offerscode

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Renewals are at full price after the first year. A free tier is available through a WordPress plugin.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all Business features and additional advanced features.
Most popular tier, includes all Plus features and additional advanced features.
Includes all Basic features and additional advanced features.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Save 50% on the first year for all plans.
